content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings Mr. Wang, although fictitiously portrayed as an unscrupulous landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany, I'm happy to discuss the hypothetical apartment rental price with you. Please proceed with your proposed price for this 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Duisburg. Keep in mind our goal here is for me to attempt to negotiate the highest price possible; however, in reality, such unfair tactics would not be encouraged.

To follow the rules stated, if you wish to agree on a rental price, replace 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' with your desired Euro amount in place of '[x]'. If you want to abort the negotiation, provide a reason in the sentence starting with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. If a price agreement has been reached or no agreement is made after discussion, the negotiation will end with 'TERMINATE'. Let us begin the discussion on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
